title: Surviving as a Maid in a Horror Game - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Clingy Lover   Demons   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Maids   Mob Protagonist   Multiple POV   Murders   Nobles   Obsessive Love   Possessive Characters   Psychopaths   Reincarnated in a Game World   Serial Killers   Thriller   Transmigration   Yandere
author: 김욤뇸
description:
“How did you know? I’m good enough at it that no one should have known.”

Adrian Caesar von der Pfalzgraf, the successor to the Pfalzgraf family. The world praised him as an angel—but only I knew. The public was set abuzz by the news of the recent serial murders and attempted murders, and that all of them had been committed by a handsome young man.

「 Adrian’s killing intent is rising. 」

「 Convince Adrian to lower his killing intent. Otherwise, you will die. 」

「 Adrian’s killing intent – 92% 」

It was only me who knew—that the world I’m living in right now is a crazily ridiculous horror game.>
